    • resCheckNit

      public void resCheckNit​(java.lang.String nit) throws exceptions.RestaurantAlreadyExistsException
      this method checks if a restaurant exists with the NIT provided, in order to add a new restaurant with that NIT
      Parameters:
      nit - a String, not null, the NIT to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.RestaurantAlreadyExistsException - if there is a restaurant registered with that NIT

    • registerProduct

      public void registerProduct()
      registers a new product after asking for data and checking if it can be added

    • otherCheckNit

      public void otherCheckNit​(java.lang.String nit) throws exceptions.RestaurantDoesNotExistException
      checks if a restaurant exists with the NIT provided, in order to use that restaurant somewhere else
      Parameters:
      nit - a String, not null, the NIT to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.RestaurantDoesNotExistException - if there is not a restaurant registered with that NIT

    • prodCheckProdCode

      Parameters:
      c - a String, not null, the code to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductAlreadyExistsException - if there is a product registered with that code

    • showProductsFromRestaurant

      public void showProductsFromRestaurant​(java.lang.String nitRes)
      shows a list of products from the restaurant with the NIT given
      Parameters:
      nitRes - a String, not null, the NIT of the restaurant that will display its products; a restaurant with this NIT must be registered

    • checkProdToAdd

      public void checkProdToAdd​(java.lang.String restNit, java.lang.String codeOfProd) throws exceptions.ProductDoesNotBelongToRestaurant, exceptions.ProductDoesNotExistException
      checks if the Product to be added belongs to the restaurant the order is being made to
      Parameters:
      restNit - a String, not null, the NIT of the restaurant the order is being made to
      codeOfProd - a String, not null, the code of the product to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductDoesNotBelongToRestaurant - if the product does not belong to the same restaurant the order is being made to
      exceptions.ProductDoesNotExistException - if there is not a product registered with that code

    • addIfSameProd

      public boolean addIfSameProd​(java.lang.String codeToCheck, java.util.List<java.lang.String> codes, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> quantities, int quant)
      checks if the code of the product to add is already in the products of the order, if so, adds to its first appearance's quantities, instead of registering the same product twice
      Parameters:
      codeToCheck - a String, not null, the code of the product to check
      codes - an ArrayList of String, not null, the codes of the products already in the order
      quantities - an ArrayList of ints, not null, the quantities of the products already in the order
      quant - an int, positive
      Returns:
      true if the product was already in the order, false if it was not.

    • getAlphaNumericString

      public java.lang.String getAlphaNumericString​(int n)
      Adapted from geeksforgeeks, generates an alphanumeric random String used as Order code
      Parameters:
      n - the number of characters of the code generated
      Returns:
      a random alphanumeric string of 10 characters that has not been used as an order code before

    • codeIsRepeated

      public boolean codeIsRepeated​(java.lang.String code)
      checks if the order code provided has been used as an order code in the orders registered
      Parameters:
      code - a String, not null the code to be checked
      Returns:
      true if it has been used, false if it has not

    • getRestNitOfOrder

      public java.lang.String getRestNitOfOrder​(java.lang.String code)
      returns the NIT if the restaurant to which the order with the code provided was made
      Parameters:
      code - a String, not null, the code of the order to be checked, the order and its restaurant must have been registered already
      Returns:
      a String, the NIT of the restaurant to which the order was made

    • updateOrderProductsAndQuantities

      public void updateOrderProductsAndQuantities​(java.lang.String nitRes, java.lang.String code) throws exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException
      updates an order's products and quantities
      Parameters:
      nitRes - a String, not null, the NIT of the restaurant to which the order was made
      code - a String, not null, the code of the order to update
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException - if the new products are not of the same Restaurant

    • updateOrderRestNit

      public void updateOrderRestNit​(java.lang.String code)
      updates an order's NIT of the restaurant that orders it, if successful, updates the products and quantities of the order
      Parameters:
      code - a String, not null, the code of the order to update
